metadata.Title: CVE-2010-4209 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Flash componentinfrastructure in YUI 2.8.0 through 2.8.1, as used in Bugzilla 3.7.1through 3.7.3 and 4.1, allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary webscript or HTML via vectors related to swfstore/swfstore.swf.

criterions.comment: loggerhead: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
